He has supernatural powers.

Finnish: Hän on yliluonnollisen vahva ja kestävä.
English: He is supernaturally strong and durable.
He has superhuman physical powers.

Finnish: Hänestä tuli yli-inhimillisen vahva ja ketterä.
English: He became superhumanly strong and agile.

Finnish: Hän voi nähdä pitemmälle kuin normaali ihminen.
English: He can see further than a normal person.
Hungarian: Tovább lát, mint egy normális ember.

Finnish: Hän on tarpeeksi vahva nostamaan 900 kiloa.
English: He is strong enough to lift 900 kilos.
He's able to lift more than 100 tons.
He is supernaturally fast.

Finnish: Hänen kehonsa toimii hyvin korkealla nopeudella.
English: His body works at a very high speed.
Hungarian: A teste nagyon nagy sebességgel működik.

English: He is able to break the speed of sound.
He reaches faster-than-light flight speeds.
Hungarian: Eléri a fénysebességnél gyorsabb repülési sebességet.

English: His brain works at super speed.

Finnish: Hän voi hypätä tasajalkaa 4 metriä ylöspäin.
English: He can jump straight up 4 meters.

Finnish: Hän voi juosta jopa 70 kilometriä tunnissa.
English: He can run up to 70 kilometers per hour.
Hungarian: Akár 70 km / h sebességgel tud futni.

Finnish: Hänen luunsa ovat ontot kuin linnulla.
English: His bones are hollow like a bird's.
Hungarian: A csontjai üresek, mint a madárnak.

Finnish: Hän voi hengittää yhtä hyvin vedessä kuin ilmassa.
English: He can breathe as well in water as in air.
Hungarian: Ugyanolyan jól tud lélegezni vízben, mint levegőben.

English: He has superhuman senses.
He has heightened senses.

Finnish: Hänellä on alitajuinen vaaran ennustava vaisto.
English: He has a subconscious instinct to predict danger.

Finnish: Hänellä on kyky aistia yliluonnollisia olentoja.
English: He has the ability to sense supernatural beings.

Finnish: Hänellä on täydellinen kyky aistia valheet.
English: He has a perfect ability to sense lies.
Hungarian: Tökéletes képessége van az igazság felismerésére.

Finnish: Hänellä on kyky aistia Thanoksen olinpaikka.
English: He has the ability to sense Thanos' whereabouts.

Finnish: Hän huomaa kevyttä hengitystä 60 metrin päästä.
English: He notices light breathing from 60 meters away.

Finnish: Hän pystyy tunnistamaan esineitä hajun perusteella.
English: He can identify objects by smell.
Hungarian: Az illat alapján képes felismerni tárgyakat.

Finnish: Hän voi seurata jotakuta hajun perusteella.
English: He can follow someone by smell.
Hungarian: Képes valakit az illat alapján követni.

Finnish: Hänellä on kyky havaita stressipisteet esineissä.
English: He has the ability to detect stress points in objects.
He has a "spider sense".

Finnish: Hänellä on sisäisen tutka-aisti, joka kompensoi sokeuttaan.
English: He has an internal radar sense to compensate for his blindness.
Hungarian: Belső radarérzéke van, ami kompenzálja a vakságát.

English: He is immortal
He can't die.
He ages more slowly.
He heals faster than normal.
His powers include the ability to heal quickly.
Hungarian: Képességei közé tartozik a gyors gyógyulás.

English: He has superhuman healing abilities.

Finnish: Hän on immuuni kuumuudelle ja tulelle.
English: He is immune to heat and fire.
Hungarian: Immunis a hőségre és a tűzre.

English: He is immune to hypnosis.
He is immune to poisons.

Finnish: Hänen kehonsa voi kestää äärimmäisiä lämpötiloja.
English: His body can withstand extreme temperatures.
Hungarian: A teste elviseli a szélsőséges hőmérsékleteket.

English: His skin withstands large temperature differences.
Hungarian: A bőre elviseli a nagy hőmérsékletkülönbségeket.

English: He can withstand immense pressure.
He is invulnerable to all fire.

Finnish: Nyrkit ja luodit menevät täysin läpi hänestä.
English: Fists and bullets go right through him.
Hungarian: Ököl és golyó teljesen áthatol rajta.

English: Objects pass harmlessly through him.
Hungarian: A tárgyak ártalmatlanul haladnak át rajta.

English: His skin can withstand bullets.
He can create force fields around himself.

Finnish: Hän voi suojata itsensä voimakenttien sisään.
English: He can shield himself inside force fields.
He can transport himself.
He moves by jumping huge leaps.

Finnish: Hän pystyy kiipeämään ylös rakennusten sivuja.
English: He can climb up the sides of buildings.
He is able to stick to all surfaces.
He can climb vertical walls.
He can run up walls.
He can dodge bullets.

Finnish: Hän omistaa laitteen, jolla voi teleportata.
English: He owns a device that can be used to teleport.
He can teleport.
He has the ability to teleport himself.
He can walk through walls.

Finnish: Hänellä on kyky liikkua kiinteän aineen läpi.
English: He has the ability to move through solid matter.

Finnish: Hänellä on kyky matkustaa avaruuden halki.
English: He has the ability to travel through space.
He can travel in hyperspace.
He sends himself to another dimension.
Hungarian: Át tudja küldeni magát egy másik dimenzióba.

English: He knows how to fly.
He can fly with his wings.
He can fly at the speed of sound.
He can fly at a speed of 150 km per hour.
He flies at the speed of light.
He can fly with his artificial wings.
He can fly using his rocket boots.
He can use his vocal powers to fly.

Finnish: Hän voi lentää mutaationa tulleiden siipiensä avulla.
English: He can fly with the help of his mutated wings.

Finnish: Hän pystyy lentämään erittäin suurella nopeudella.
English: He can fly at a very high speed.
He is a shapeshifter.
He has the ability to change his size.
He can change to the size of a tennis ball.

Finnish: Hän voi muuttaa minkä tahansa esineen kokoa.
English: He can change the size of any object.
He transforms his body into organic steel.
He can turn into a wolf.

Finnish: Hän voi muuttaa olomuotoaan miksi tahansa eläimeksi.
English: He can change his form into any animal.

Finnish: Hänellä on kyky muutella kehonsa tiheyttä.
English: He has the ability to change the density of his body.
He can control his density.
He can change the atomic structure of his body.
He is able to change his molecular structure.
He can become intangible.
He is able to turn invisible.
He is able to make objects invisible.
He has the ability to turn into fire.

Finnish: Hän muuttaa vartalonsa veden kaltaiseksi aineeksi.
English: He transforms his body to a water-like substance.
He can turn into living lightning.
He turns his fists into clubs.

Finnish: Hän voi venyttää raajojaan pitkien matkojen päähän.
English: He can stretch his limbs for long distances.
Hungarian: A végtagjait hosszú távolságokra tudja nyújtani.

English: He can change his appearance at will.
He's a telepath.
He is able to read thoughts.
He is able to read his opponent's mind.

Finnish: Hän voi lähettää ajatuksiaan muiden mieliin.
English: He can send his thoughts to the minds of others.
Hungarian: El tudja küldeni gondolatait mások elméjébe.

Finnish: Hän heijastaa omia ajatuksiaan muiden mieliin.
English: He projects his own thoughts onto the minds of others.
He's able to create a hypnotic state in people.
He has the ability to hypnotize people.
He is able to plant hypnotic suggestions.

Finnish: Hän voi hypnotisoida ihmisiä tekemään asioita.
English: He can hypnotize people to do things.
Hungarian: Képes hipnotizálni az embereket dolgok elvégzésére.

Finnish: Hänellä on kyky hallita toisten ihmisten mieliä.
English: He has the ability to control other people's minds.

Finnish: Hänellä on kyky alistaa ihmisten oma tahto.
English: He has the ability to subdue people's own will.
Hungarian: Képes alávetni az emberek saját akaratát.

Finnish: Hänellä on kyky hallita lintuja telepaattisesti.
English: He has the ability to control birds telepathically.
He can communicate with aquatic animals.
He can manipulate insects telepathically.

Finnish: Hän voi pyyhkiä muistoja tai koko muistin.
English: He can erase memories or the entire memory.
Hungarian: Képes törölni emlékeket vagy az egész memóriát.

Finnish: Hän imee elävien olentojen elinvoimaa kehoonsa.
English: He absorbs the life force of living beings into his body.
Hungarian: Elnyeli az élőlények életenergiáját a testébe.

Finnish: Hänellä on kyky imeä toisten elinvoimaa.
English: He has the ability to absorb the life force of others.

Finnish: Hän imee kosketuksellaan supervoimat ja muistot.
English: He absorbs superpowers and memories with his touch.
Hungarian: Érintésével elnyeli a szuperképességeket és emlékeket.

Finnish: Hän kykenee ymmärtämään mitä tahansa kieltä.
English: He's able to understand any language.
He has the power to create illusions.
He is able to create convincing illusions.

Finnish: Hän voi projisoida aineettoman kuvan itsestään.
English: He can project an intangible image of himself.
Hungarian: Képes kivetíteni egy anyagtalan képet önmagáról.

English: He manipulates electronic devices with his mind.
Hungarian: Szívesen manipulál elektronikus eszközöket az elméjével.

English: He can short-circuit electronic circuits.
Hungarian: Rövidre tudja zárni az elektronikus áramköröket.

Finnish: Hän voi luoda itsestään identtisiä klooneja.
English: He can create identical clones of himself.

Finnish: Hänellä on psioninen kyky ennustaa tulevaisuutta.
English: He has the psionic ability to predict the future.
Hungarian: Pszionikus képessége van a jövő előrejelzésére.

English: He can look at alternative futures.
He can become invisible.
He shapes the fabric of reality.
He is able to create pocket universes.
He creates openings to other dimensions.
He has telekinetic abilities.
He can telekinetically lift 10 tons.

Finnish: Hän pystyy liikuttamaan pieniä esineitä telekineettisesti.
English: He can move small objects telekinetically.
He can move objects with his thoughts.

Finnish: Hän voi levitoida ja manipuloida eläviä olentoja.
English: He can levitate and manipulate living beings.
He is able to levitate metal objects.
He is able to levitate in the air.
He can manipulate the basic elements of nature.
Hungarian: Képes a természet alapvető elemeit irányítani.

English: He can control the movement of water.

Finnish: Hän voi saada aikaan pyörremyrskyn puhaltamalla.
English: He can create a whirlwind by blowing.
He is capable of creating tornado speed winds.
He can create sandstorms.

Finnish: Hän manipuloi kiven ja maan molekyylejä.
English: He manipulates the molecules of rock and earth.
Hungarian: A kő és föld molekuláit manipulálja.

English: He can create earthquakes.

Finnish: Hän voi luoda sadetta, myrskyä ja voimakkaita tuulia.
English: He can create rain, storm, and strong winds.
Hungarian: Esőt, vihart és erős szelet tud létrehozni.

Finnish: Hänellä on psioninen kyky hallita säätä.
English: He has the psionic ability to control the weather.
Hungarian: Pszionikus képessége van az időjárás irányítására.

English: He has the ability to absorb solar energy.
He uses solar energy as a physical force.
He can create powerful vibrational waves.
He creates powerful sound waves.
He uses his sonic powers to break objects.
He can freeze objects.

Finnish: Hän viilentää esineiden lämpötilaa pakkasen puolelle.
English: He cools the temperature of objects to freezing.
He controls heat energy with his mind.
Hungarian: Szívesen irányítja a hőenergiát az elméjével.

Finnish: Hänellä on kyky hallita ympärillään olevaa lämpöä.
English: He has the ability to control the heat around him.
Hungarian: Képes irányítani a körülötte lévő hőt.

Finnish: Hänellä on kyky kietoa ruumiinsa tulisella plasmalla.
English: He has the ability to wrap his body in fiery plasma.
He can create fire psionically.

Finnish: Hän voi aiheuttaa aseiden piippujen sulamista.
English: He can cause the barrels of guns to melt.

Finnish: Hän peittää koko kehonsa tuliseen plasmaan.
English: He covers his entire body in fiery plasma.

Finnish: Hän luo ja manipuloi supertulista plasmaa.
English: He creates and manipulates super fiery plasma.
Hungarian: Szuper tüzes plazmát hoz létre és irányít.

Finnish: Hän luo plasman salamoita silmistään ja käsistään.
English: He creates bolts of plasma from his eyes and hands.
Hungarian: Plazma villámokat hoz létre a szemeiből és kezeiből.

English: He controls electric and gravity fields.
Hungarian: Irányítja az elektromos és gravitációs mezőket.

English: He can create an anti-gravity field.

Finnish: Hän voi muotoilla ja manipuloida magneettikenttiä.
English: He can shape and manipulate magnetic fields.
Hungarian: Formálni és manipulálni tudja a mágneses mezőket.

English: He has the ability to manipulate magnetism.
He can raise a magnetic field around himself.
Hungarian: Képes mágneses mezőt emelni maga köré.

English: He can project magnetic energy.
He absorbs energy from electromagnetic radiation.
Hungarian: Elnyeli az energiát az elektromágneses sugárzásból.

Finnish: Hän imee häneen suunnattua kineettistä energiaa.
English: He absorbs kinetic energy directed at him.
He is able to absorb energy.
His body produces electromagnetic energy.

Finnish: Hänellä on kyky manipuloida kosmista energiaa.
English: He has the ability to manipulate cosmic energy.
He's capable of creating powerful energy blasts.
He shoots powerful energy bolts.

Finnish: Hän aiheuttaa kipua ampumalla psyykkisiä salamoita.
English: He inflicts pain by shooting psychic bolts.

Finnish: Hän pystyy ampumaan mystisen voiman salamoita.
English: He is capable of shooting bolts of mystical power.

Finnish: Hän voi lamauttaa toisia psionisilla salamoilla.
English: He can paralyze others with psionic lightning bolts.

Finnish: Hänellä on kyky luoda tuhoavia psionisia piikkejä.
English: He has the ability to create devastating psionic spikes.
His favorite weapons are small knives.
He uses a variety of hand weapons.
He is an accomplished handgun user.

Finnish: Hän on mestari käyttämään pieniteräisiä aseita.
English: He is a master at using small-bladed weapons.
Hungarian: Mester a kis pengéjű fegyverek használatában.

English: He's great at throwing bladed weapons.

Finnish: Hän käyttää usein heittoveitsiä ja heittotähtiä.
English: He often uses throwing knives and throwing stars.
His weapons are two 75 cm swords.
He wields a samurai sword.

Finnish: Hänen miekkansa ampuu tulta ja myrkkykaasua.
English: His sword shoots fire and poison gas.
Hungarian: Kardja tüzet és mérges gázt lövell.

English: His sword cuts through anything.

Finnish: Hänen ainoa aseensa on tähtikuvioitu kilpi.
English: His only weapon is a star-patterned shield.
Hungarian: Az egyetlen fegyvere egy csillagmintás pajzs.

English: His main weapon is an enchanted hammer.
He can use hellfire as a weapon.
He can shoot arrows from his wrist guns.

Finnish: Hän pystyy ampua sulkiaan nuolien tapaan.
English: He can shoot his feathers like arrows.
He shoots laser beams and plasma charges.
He shoots lasers from his eyes.
He can shoot fire from his fingertips.
He shoots a ruby red beam from his eyes.
He can shoot bullets from his index finger.
He shoots poisoned spikes from his wrists.
He shoots energy beams from his gloves.
He has web-shooters attached to the wrists.
He shoots webs from his hands.
He uses expensive special equipment in battle.
There is a hidden laser beam in his walking stick.
He has retractable claws.
He is paralyzed from the waist down.

Finnish: Hänellä on sininen turkki, keltaiset silmät ja häntä.
English: He has blue fur, yellow eyes and a tail.
Hungarian: Kék bundája, sárga szemei és farka van.

Finnish: Hän on vihreäihoinen Marsista kotoisin oleva humanoidi.
English: He is a green-skinned humanoid from Mars.
Hungarian: Zöld bőrű humanoid, a Marsról származik.

Finnish: Hänen ihonsa koostuu oransseista, halkeilleista laatoista.
English: His skin consists of orange, cracked tiles.
He covers his identity with white goggles.
He wears a mask.
He wears a colorful suit.
He usually wears a green robe.
His suit is red in color.
His suit has an S on the chest.
Hungarian: Ruháján S betű van a mellkasán.

Finnish: Hänellä on Yhdysvaltain lippuun perustuva univormu.
English: He has a uniform based on the American flag.
Hungarian: Az Egyesült Államok zászlajára alapozott egyenruhája van.

Finnish: Hän käyttää asua, jossa on pitkä viitta.
English: He wears an outfit with a long cape.

Finnish: Hän käyttää sinistä viittaa, jossa on punaiset raidat.
English: He wears a blue cloak with red stripes.
He wears a bat-like outfit.
His suit stops bullets.

Finnish: Kun hänellä on puku yllään, hän voi nostaa 320 kg.
English: When wearing the suit, he can lift 320 kg.
Hungarian: Amikor a ruhát viseli, 320 kg-ot tud felemelni.

English: He wears armor.
He wears power armor.

Finnish: Hänen pukunsa on valmistettu luodinkestävästä kevlarista.
English: His suit is made from bulletproof Kevlar.

Finnish: Hän voi nostaa kaksi tonnia haarniskansa avulla.
English: He can lift two tons with his armor.
He uses mechanical wings as his equipment.
His suit has artificial wings.
He gets his power from an amulet.
He has a red jewel on his forehead.
He has a ring made of kryptonite.

Finnish: Hänellä on hanskat, joissa on sisäänvedettävät terät.
English: He has gloves with retractable blades.
He owns a helmet that protects against telepathy.
Hungarian: Birtokol egy sisakot, amely véd a telepátia ellen.

English: He has a cybernetic helmet.
He usually uses a hovering chair.
He is a motorcycle stuntman.

Finnish: Hän ajaa lepakkoautollaan Gotham Cityn ympäri.
English: He drives his bat car around Gotham City.
Hungarian: A denevérautójával Gotham City körül vezet.

Finnish: Hänen salainen tukikohtansa on nimeltään Lepakkoluola.
English: His secret base is called the Batcave.
He was born on the planet Krypton.
He was exposed to a mutation chemical.
He was created using the Super Soldier Serum.

Finnish: Hän putosi kemikaalihappoa täynnä olevaan altaaseen.
English: He fell into a pool full of chemical acid.
Hungarian: Egy vegyi savval teli medencébe esett.

English: He's from space.
A radioactive gamma bomb exploded.
As a teenager, a radioactive spider bit him.
Hungarian: Tini korában megcsípte egy radioaktív pók.

Finnish: Hän sai voimansa mutageneettisen kaasun räjähdyksestä.
English: He got his powers from a mutagenic gas explosion.
Hungarian: Képességeit egy mutagén gáz robbanása adta.

He got his powers from cosmic radiation.

Hungarian: A kozmikus sugárzás genetikai változásokat okozott.

Finnish: Hänelle annettiin vihreästä apinasta tehtyä seerumia.
English: He was given a serum made from a green monkey.
Hungarian: Egy zöld majomból készült szérumot adtak neki.

Finnish: Mitä enemmän hän suuttuu, sitä enemmän hän vahvistuu.
English: The angrier he gets, the stronger he gets.
Hungarian: Minél dühösebb lesz, annál erősebbé válik.

He is a particularly agile athlete.

Finnish: Hän on erinomainen akrobaatti ja lähitaistelija.

He is a master of martial arts.

Finnish: Hän on mestari useissa itämaisissa taistelulajeissa.
English: He is a master of several oriental martial arts.

Finnish: Hän on myös hyvä aseeton taistelija.
English: He is also a good unarmed fighter.

Finnish: Hän on taitava miekkailija ja ampuja.
English: He is a skilled swordsman and marksman.
He is a master marksman and swordsman.

Finnish: Hän on taidokas lähitaistelussa ja miekkailussa.
English: He is skilled in close combat and swordsmanship.
He is a skilled assassin.
He is an Olympic level archer.

Finnish: Hän on nerokas strategi ja ongelmanratkaisija.
English: He is a brilliant strategist and problem solver.
He works as a scientist and inventor.
He's a genius at picking locks.
